title: Automatic Trello board cleanup by removing cards with specific labels
description:
Automatically clean up Trello boards by deleting any cards labeled **‚ÄúMark for Deletion.‚Äù**  

This workflow checks all cards on your chosen Trello board, looks for the **Mark for Deletion** label, and removes those cards automatically ‚Äî keeping your boards tidy without manual effort.  



## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Trello (Developer API)
1. Get your **API key**: https://trello.com/app-key  
2. Generate a **token** (from the same page ‚Üí **Token**)
3. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Trello API**, paste **API Key** and **Token**, save.  
4. Open each Trello node (**Get Board**, **Get Lists**, **Get Cards**) and select your Trello credential.


### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Add Your Board URL to ‚ÄúGet Board‚Äù
1. Copy your Trello board URL (e.g., `https://trello.com/b/DCpuJbnd/administrative-tasks`).  
2. Open the **Get Board** node ‚Üí **Resource: Board**, **Operation: Get**.  
3. In **ID**, choose **URL** mode and paste the **board URL**.  
   - The node will resolve the board and output its `id` ‚Üí used by **Get Lists** / **Get Cards**.
